title: iPad Mini 4 Review: It's Still the Best Tablet You Can Buy!
description:
Apple's latest iPad, the iPad Mini 4 is their best 8-inch tablet to date. Retina display, improved touch-id and now using a faster A8 CPU with 2GB Ram. Available in 3 storage choices 16, 64 or 128GB. Check out my video for the full review!

Should you buy the iPad Mini 4?
